errors.error_description: The README mentions that Python is required but does not specify the version, which can lead to compatibility issues if an older, unsupported version of Python is used.
correction_candidates: You'll need to have the latest version of Python 3 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have Python 3.6 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have Python 3 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
You'll need to have Python >=3.6 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.
errors.golden_answer: You'll need to have Python >=3.6 installed in your system for Git Gud to work.

errors.error_description: The installation command `pip3 install git gud` is incorrect because it tries to install two separate packages, 'git' and 'gud', instead of the single 'git-gud' package.
